lead_paragraph: Twice MotoGP world champion Marc Marquez has extended his contract with Honda for two more years, the Japanese manufacturer said in a statement on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Marquez Renews With Honda for Two More Years
headline.main: Marquez Renews With Honda for Two More Years
